SEARCH
Package grafiosch.repository

Class UDFDataJpaRepositoryImpl

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.repository.UDFDataJpaRepositoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UDFDataJpaRepositoryCustom
public class UDFDataJpaRepositoryImpl extends Object implements UDFDataJpaRepositoryCustom
Implementation of custom repository operations for UDFData entities. This class provides specialized functionality for creating, updating, and retrieving user-defined field data with proper validation, security checks, and metadata verification. The implementation ensures that UDF operations are performed only on supported entities and that users have appropriate access rights to the referenced entities.

  • Method Details

    • createUpdate

      public UDFData createUpdate(UDFData udfData) throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: UDFDataJpaRepositoryCustom
      Creates a new UDFData entity or updates an existing one with validation and security checks. This method performs metadata validation against the corresponding UDFMetadata and ensures the current user has proper access rights to the referenced entity.
      Specified by:
      createUpdate in interface UDFDataJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      udfData - the UDFData entity to create or update, must contain valid user, entity, and idEntity references
      Returns:
      the saved UDFData entity with any generated values populated
      Throws:
      Exception - if validation fails, security checks fail, or database operations encounter errors

    • getUDFDataByIdUserAndEntityAndIdEntity

      public Optional<UDFData> getUDFDataByIdUserAndEntityAndIdEntity(Integer idUser, String entity, Integer idEntity)
      Description copied from interface: UDFDataJpaRepositoryCustom
      Retrieves UDFData for a specific user, entity type, and entity ID combination. This method looks up user-defined field data using the composite key consisting of user ID, entity class name, and the specific entity instance ID.
      Specified by:
      getUDFDataByIdUserAndEntityAndIdEntity in interface UDFDataJpaRepositoryCustom
      Parameters:
      idUser - the ID of the user who owns the UDF data
      entity - the name of the entity class that the UDF data extends
      idEntity - the ID of the specific entity instance
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the UDFData if found, or empty Optional if no data exists for the given key
